topics.body:
News update:
Ukraine has had enough of Russia's shit and now are shelling military envoys that go into Ukraine.

You know how a while back there were Russian forces heading into Ukraine?  Yeah; they got wiped out.  The moral of this is don't try to start shit by sending your forces into a foreign country when the USA is giving the country you're trying to start shit in exact locations of your forces in that country.

If you're wondering what I mean by this is that the USA right now is sort of helping Ukraine by giving satellite images and locations of rebel forces as well as telling them where Russian forces in Ukraine are positioned at.  In other words: Russia sends troops into Ukraine -> USA tells Ukraine where those Russian troops are in Ukraine -> Ukraine bombs them.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
